# UI <%= classify(name) %>

This library contains the <%= name %> UI component for the <%= domain %> domain.

## Usage

Import the component in your feature modules:

```typescript
import { <%= classify(name) %> } from '@<%= app %>/<%= domain %>/ui-<%= name %>';
```

## Structure

- `src/lib/<%= name %>.ts` - Main UI component
- `src/lib/<%= name %>.spec.ts` - Component tests
- `src/public-api.ts` - Public API exports
